snippet.title: EVASION | PlayStation VR Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Experience the future of VR combat. Play solo or team up to save an embattled human colony from swarms of invading Optera. Built for VR and optimized for the AIM Controller, Evasion is the authentic FPS experience PlayStation VR fans have been waiting for!
